text: Rosny Smarth (19 October 1940 â€“ 15 January 2025) was a Haitian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Haiti for a short time from 1996 to 1997. His political party was the OPL. Smarth died on 15 January 2025, aged 84. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Haiti
